Headquarters Location: New York, New York, United States
Description: JumpWire makes it easy to enforce secure data practices across applications without having to change any code.
Full Description: JumpWire makes it easy to enforce secure data practices across applications without having to change any code. By proxying requests to databases and APIs and inspecting their schemas and payloads, JumpWire automatically identifies fields that need special handling. JumpWire will transform the data in place (for example encrypting any field that is classified as PII). This ensures that further processing or storage won’t risk leaking the data in its raw form inadvertently. A common use case for JumpWire is moving data between internal databases and tools for analytics and customer support. In this scenario, specific columns (such as those corresponding to PII) may need special handling before loading into another tool with a more permissive access concept. JumpWire installs on-premise or inside our customer’s own cloud, so there is no dependency on a third party or concern with sharing data outside the network.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Other, Privacy and Security, Software
Founders: Ryan Cooke, William Huba, William Huba

Description: Plug-and-play drone solution for public safety agencies. Real-time situational awareness, rapid emergency response, and expert flight crews.
Full Description: SentinelSky is an industry-leading provider of innovative drone-based solutions specifically designed for public safety organizations. Our comprehensive platform offers a plug-and-play, subscription-based service that significantly enhances emergency response operations. By harnessing the power of advanced drone technology, SentinelSky equips first responders with real-time situational awareness, enabling them to make informed decisions and swiftly respond to incidents. Our platform ensures 24/7 availability and rapid response to emergency calls, providing a crucial advantage in critical situations. Our drones, operated by our experienced flight crews, are equipped with state-of-the-art sensors and cameras, delivering unparalleled aerial views and data collection capabilities. This empowers public safety agencies with critical insights, allowing them to allocate resources effectively, mitigate risks, and improve overall public safety outcomes. With a user-friendly interface and seamless integration, SentinelSky simplifies the adoption and utilization of drone technology for public safety organizations. Our subscription-based model offers cost-effectiveness and flexibility, eliminating the need for agencies to maintain their own drone fleet. SentinelSky's vision is to revolutionize emergency response operations, empowering public safety agencies with cutting-edge technology and a comprehensive system that includes our own flight crews, equipment, and infrastructure. By addressing the challenges of situational awareness, safety concerns, and limited budgets, SentinelSky aims to transform the way public safety organizations approach emergency response, enhancing the effectiveness and efficiency of their operations.

Full Description: Longwalks was started in pursuit of a feeling  - the feeling you get when you truly connect with someone. In those rare moments of true connection, you feel seen for who you truly are. Sometimes, sparks fly.  Today, finding those moments have become more difficult. Our world is rife with connectivity, but many of us are lacking true connection. We spend our time on devices and on platforms that are meant to bring us closer together, but they often leave us lonelier.  We ask the right questions that help you shine, to be your real self so you can meet others based on what really matters to you.  Because better relationships mean happier people. Description: Coherent Digital is to tame wild content across disciplines, subject areas, sources and formats.
Full Description: What we do We find critical content that’s uncatalogued, undiscoverable, uncitable, prone to link rot, and likely to disappear. We call it wild content. It’s in websites, reports, social media, blogs, virtual reality, and primary sources—but if you can’t find it, you can’t use it. We discover, curate, index, enrich, preserve, and distribute wild content, making it easy for libraries to deploy it across their organizations. Important works that have been absent from the scholarly record can now be accessible, safe, and permanently available. How we do it (with community) We’ve created a series of websites, called Commons, that bring together licensed materials, wild content, and tools for researchers, librarians, and students. Commons members share, suggest, upload, and contribute. The sites are created, improved, and grown collaboratively—with communities of librarians, expert researchers, and publishers. What we’ve achieved so far Students and researchers from hundreds of institutions across six continents use our Commons. We’ve helped drive new research, built out the scholarly record for fugitive items, and rescued the output of hundreds of discontinued organizations. We’ve built partnerships with publishers whose content we’ve licensed, and we’ve helped thousands of organizations by increasing traffic to their websites.
Headquarters Regions: Washington DC Metro Area, East Coast, Southern US

Description: Marketing technology company.
Full Description: STORYSOFT is a storytelling software company built by marketers, for marketers. We believe that storytelling is the best way for brands to break through the clutter and create authentic emotional connections with audiences, so we built a marketing platform around storytelling. Our patent pending digital storytelling platform is used by marketers to create, share, and track their brand stories at scale.  The platform combines a easy-to-use story builder, powerful marketing technologies for simple story sharing, and actionable analytics.  STORYSOFT stories are immersive digital experiences that hold attention, evoke emotion, and compel action. Think social media stories, but more powerful, flexible, and insightful.  Marketers use STORYSOFT to tell stories about their brand, products, services, employees and customers in order to create awareness, boost acquisition, drive sales, increase retention, and obtain insights. STORYSOFT stories are a series content screens strung together to create a linear narrative. Content screens are constructed using brand assets like images, animations, text, video, and surveys.  Built mobile-first, audiences navigate STORYSOFT stories by swiping right-to-left. However, a responsive UI allows audiences to access stories from any device. The most valuable aspect of STORYSOFT stories is their flexibility, which makes story creation, sharing, & tracking more efficient for marketers. Stories are hosted on a URL, which allows marketers or agencies to create story content once, and share stories through every marketing channel just like you would share a link to a website.  Built-in analytics are based upon the linear storyflow. Consumers all follow the same path, which creates a consistency within the reports that makes it easy to understand which messages are consumed and what actions audiences are taking. Stories can then be optimized over time based on these insights in order to increase their effectiveness in driving behavior. STORYSOFT is used by brands big & small across various industries because… Every brand has a story. Scale yours.
Headquarters Regions: Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Advertising, Sales and Marketing, Software

Description: SkyBlue is a home medical supplies, retail company.
Full Description: Founded in 2018, SkyBlue.com is all about making things better and giving back - to our customers, our local community and beyond.  Our website, dedicated to home medical supplies and healthcare necessities is here to help you - choose the right thing, buy the right thing and have the right thing delivered to your door, or to the door of a loved one.  While that's the core of the business, it's not the heart. Yes, it sounds old fashioned, but we really care about our customers. We started SkyBlue because our whole team had stories about being in their most vulnerable state, or caring for others who were vulnerable and we knew we wanted to make the process of finding, buying and delivering home medical supplies easier on everyone.  A company that is passionate about giving back, SkyBlue.com's monthly charitable donation program will choose a charity, local or national, to showcase and we will collect donations from our customers (that we will match!) all through the month. At the end of the month we will donate funds to the selected cause. Whether you need help in finding the right bandage, cane or underpad, or you are buying for a loved one, or you're ready to buy from a small business who is dedicated to giving back and creating a better world, we want to offer you an easy experience, a great value and comprehensive information...to make things better. We'll always do our best to serve you! Welcome to SkyBlue.com!

Full Description: 네스텐 (Nesten) is a preeminent IoT communications provider with decades of experience developing IoT-optimized blockchains and complex, community-driven networks. Our team has deep roots in cellular technologies, dating back to the low-power architecture and implementation of our own mobile WiMAX network, which laid the foundation for key features of 4G and 5G. Since our company’s inception in 2018, we have been a trailblazer in the blockchain and edge computing arenas dedicated to providing people with a trusted communications platform and the tools they need to realize its myriad real-world use cases. In 2019, we began actively deploying our flagship communications and computing platform—the G1 wireless node—across several major urban areas, establishing significant network coverage footprints in more than 10 countries around the world. In the years since, we’ve continued to expand, establishing partnerships with globally recognized visionaries in various facets of the IoT sphere and out-pacing our competition in leading seismic paradigm change. Our journey may be uncharted, but with partners and participants who are as focused on redefining the communications landscape as we are, we’ll continue to charge forward, paving the way ahead for the future of IoT.

Description: Calido is the intelligent product collaboration platform empowering teams to deliver better products faster
Full Description: Calido makes it easy for product teams to build a single source of truth in order to understand user needs, prioritize what to build next, align everyone on the roadmap, and engage with their stakeholders. Calido helps you identify priorities, simplify workflows, and make data-driven decisions with one platform that cuts through the tech clutter.  Key benefits of using Calido Clarity - Cut through the noise and focus on what matters most You can reach product-market fit in no time with features that are dialed into the most important customer insights. Plus, you’re able to share roadmaps and dashboards with your stakeholders so everyone can collaborate on priorities from day one. Vision - Get alignment and excitement around your product Manage everything from your product strategy to marketing campaign in one place. With Calido, you’re able to rally everyone around your vision to get buy-in from key decision-makers, and collaboratively manage the full product or project. You can create custom shared views to engage your teams at every stage.  Share a view with developers that lets them track product iterations and release, and create a shareable timeline to keep everyone in the loop. You can even present an editable Live View at your next meeting to adjust resources, progress, and priorities in real time—and really impress your stakeholders. Insights - Bring the voice of the customer and build what matters Create custom views and dashboards to keep your teams in the loop. Capture reactions to your ideas so you can prioritize the features your customers actually want. You can simply publish an idea portal to invite user feedback, discover new insights, and validate your ideas.  Calido’s idea portals let your users and stakeholders react to new ideas in real time. Your customers and stakeholders can even share their thoughts on new features with a built-in comment section to get an idea of what you should prioritize for future releases. Ready, set, go - Hit the ground running your way and see value from day one Calido makes it easy to start any project with customizable templates. Jumpstart your workflow with a library of easy-to-use templates, including a fully customizable roadmap, idea portal, launch plan, marketing campaign, and many more. You can also use Calido to manage a wide range of projects, from usability testing to marketing campaigns and team tasks. Just import your own content, and use the drag-and-drop feature to create different workspaces and trackers for your teams. And you can even build your own templates in just a few clicks. Calido’s support team is ready to assist when you need it.

Industry Groups: Sales and Marketing, Software

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Software, Web Development, Web3
Description: AI Engine For Your Web3 Rocket.
Full Description: Octacore is a revolutionary AI-driven Web3 Developer Toolkit, crucial for developing dApps with ease and preparing them for mass adoption.                           The magic behind Octacore lies in its core technology, which is built around two pivotal standards: ERC4337, known as **Account Abstraction**, and ERC6551, referred to as **Token Bound Accounts**. These standards are fundamental in providing individual wallets for any NFT and, consequently, making the web3 world ripe for reaching the masses.             OctacoreAI takes a two-pronged approach:             1. OctaMind - AI Driven Development: It is chatbot for AI-driven development for Web3 using Octacore's APIs and SDKs. OctaMind is designed to handle Web3 specific queries and help developers understand web3 concepts, how to build web3 projects using Octacore including step-by-step guides, code snippets and help with any queries related to Octacore's products and services. Deploy Cryptocurrencies, NFTs, DAOs, AI-Generated Suites, Build dApps, all from a chat.                      2. Szabo - General Purpose Web3 Agent: The Szabo model helps users to navigate the complex world of Web3 with natural language with conversational user flows. This model fetches on-chain data and renders a button to execute transactions to fulfil all your Web 3 needs including DeFi, NFTs, DAOs and so much more.              Additionally, you can also integrate Szabo into your platform to give your users the power to converse to your platform and construct custom and complex transaction and that they can execute right during conversation, GASLESSLY.             The core technology empowers three integral layers of Octacore:                          IDENTITY LAYER: Simplifies user onboarding to dApps with a PLUG-N-PLAY infrastructure, offering customized solutions like Social Login, Smart Login, and TBA Login.                          APPLICATION LAYER: Streamlines the development process by providing ready-to-deploy, audited Templates and Suites of Smart Contracts, and assists in managing roles, upgrades, and other smart contract interactions.                          DATA LAYER: Offers fast and reliable data through APIs, SDKs, and Webhooks, eliminating the need for node management and intricate blockchain development knowledge.                          Together, these layers, powered by Account Abstraction (ERC4337) and Token Bound Accounts (ERC6551), simplify building, deploying, and managing dApps, making them accessible and ready for widespread adoption.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Data and Analytics, Internet Services, Science and Engineering, Software

Full Description: Hutano is a platform that makes it easy for patients to find heathcare providers. Patients can connect with physicians, chiropractors, physical therapists, and medically licensed healthcare professionals. The platform consists a web interface and an iOS/android app. Patients can create an account for family members or a minor or older adult. After entering demographic data, the patient can search Hutano for near and far clinicians,  ok an appointment, and pay for services online. Providers can display out-of-pocket prices in addition to insurances they take. Hutano patients can find healthcare providers, book an appointment, and communicate with them without picking up the phone. For providers, Hutano is a complete practice management tool to streamline appointment management,  documentation, and payment. It is also a more effective advertising and marketing platform, better than search engines because Hutano is optimized for healthcare provider search.  Hutano allows providers to start using its platform to start or grow brick and mortar,  telehealth, or onsite practice in hours. It was started in 2019 by Ephraim Makuve, a physical therapist and technologist.  Hutano means health in Shona. The platform has been received well in Las Vegas and continues to grow after raising at least $500K in Angel Investments. Currently, Hutano is rasing $3M to expand its customer base and implement e-prescription and billing.

Industries: Business Intelligence, Electronic Health Record (EHR), Enterprise Software, Health Care, Medical, SaaS
Description: a cloud-based platform of medical providers facilitating reliable patient referral management and secure information exchange.
Full Description: MedMatch Network is a cloud-based network of healthcare providers facilitating patient referral management and information exchange while also ensuring patient access to providers and their health information. The MedMatch vision is a world in which medical practitioners and patients communicate and exchange health information easily and securely to improve access and delivery of care. The open registration platform invites providers to create and verify their credentials and publish their practice profile and availability. Providers can connect with existing colleagues or engage with new ones to create their own vetted network. Providers co-manage patients, make and track referrals, share valuable information with other providers in their prequalified network. A patient portal is designed to keep patients engaged with their providers. Referrals are electronically. The platform ensures that providers and their patients can locate and schedule in network providers in their geographic area in just few seconds. Integration with electronic health records ensures interoperability, portability and quality referrals. The platform FHIR-enabled database securely hosts patient information and makes it accessible when needed. The tracking feature informs on patient referral status and updates everyone involved through confirmations and reminders thereby preventing referral leakage. MedMatch Network is HIPAA compliant. Description: SCO2 upcycles oils from food and Ag waste leveraging award-winning, patented technology and directly alters the environmental impact
Full Description: SCO2 broke the rules when it comes to supercritical CO2 extraction - and won the AE50 award in 2022 with one of the most innovative agricultural technologies. This patented process improves cycle time, minimizes material handling, lowers operating costs and improves yield and quality from other systems. As the greenest of all extraction methods, SCO2 plans to recover oils from the waste accumulating for growers and processors.  Our business model is simple: 'turn trash into cash'. We hate to see anything go to waste (and harm the environment). Our plan is simple - supply the same high-value essential oils being purchased by medium and large oil customers in the Food, Pharma, Cosmetics and Personal Care segments that are sustainably sourced and offered at a %-10% discount. Our customer is already motivated to meet key sustainability objectives. The financial incentive is designed to accelerate adoption. With zero cost raw material, low operating costs and high yields, SCO2 is a least cost producer who can afford to make a meaningful impact. In the U.S., 56 billion pounds of food is wasted at growers and processors each year. But, we can make a difference. SCO2 has the right people, plan and patents to uniquely tackle this problem. Come join us!

Description: Amet Actio Technology develops a clean development mechanism to prevent global warming and sustainable renewable energy.
Full Description: Amet Actio Technology Ltd, which has registered in Delaware USA, is conducting various renewable energy development projects in fields such as biomass, solar, wind, hydro and geothermal in accordance with greenhouse gas reduction programs of UNFCCC (United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change) which are Sustainable Development Mechanism (SDM) and Renewable Energy 100% (RE100) to prevent global warming.  AAT also develops an integrated Certified Emission Reductions (CERs) trading platform where the CERs are minted and converted to eCERs (electronic CERs) through Artificial Intelligence (AI) of Measurable, Reportable, Verifiable (MRV) system based on Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT).  Carbon market had restrictions in generating and trading CERs between countries and continents because of the Kyoto Protocol in 2005 but Conference of Parties (COP) held in Paris launched the New Climate Regime (Paris Agreement) in 2015. In response, AAT platform made a fundamental approach to address issues of environmental soundness, transparency, accuracy, completeness, comparability, accessibility and prevent double counting, which are important agendas of Article 6 of Paris Agreement. This solution will encourage more people to actively participate in the carbon market to reduce greenhouse gas. To this stand, as the first step, AAT is developing an incineration power generation project in Lombok, Indonesia from July 2022. The CER generated through this project will be converted to eCER and then traded as Offset on the AAT platform. This will be a direct solution for ESG management, carbon neutrality, and greenhouse gas reduction, which the international community is deeply concerned about.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Energy, Internet Services, Science and Engineering, Sustainability

Industries: Online Portals, Real Estate, Rental, Software
Description: Matrix is a Universal Rental Application that uses data-driven analysis to streamline the application process.
Full Description: Traditional credit scoring is statistically less inclusive for minorities, immigrants and younger people, lacking a long credit history. This happens to overlap with the majority of renters, particularly in Affordable Housing. Matrix uses real time data and produces an “ability to pay” score. Using a variety of factors, including Assets, Income and Previous Rental History, the result is more inclusive scoring that gives property managers insights into the full financial profile of a prospective tenant. Matrix removes the potential for Source of Income discrimination, taking the subsidy into consideration and automating the underwriting process. On the back end, today’s processing time for Affordable Housing is approximately 36 days. This leads to compounding losses for property managers, making public housing acceptance simply not an option for many landlords. Matrix streamlines the acceptance process and shortens it by up to 50%, helping more owners make their properties available to affordable housing and get leased up faster.
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, New England, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Internet Services, Real Estate, Software

With a steadfast commitment to upholding HACCP (Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points) standards, we ensure the highest level of safety and quality in our operations. Whether you're seeking private label CBD ingredients or ready-to-sell white-label CBD products, Arvanna has you covered. Our extensive range includes CBG, CBN, water-solubles, and more. Experience our exceptional formulations, such as the industry-leading Flavian Full Spectrum CBD Oil™ or the innovative Florian Broad Spectrum CBD Oil™.

Description: Hybrid Intelligence recruiting and placement startup, working to augment individuals and teams
Full Description: Prime Deviation is a Hybrid Intelligence startup working to augment individuals and teams to thrive in a world of Artificial General Intelligence. Using narrow AI agents to focus teams of high-performing individuals into a single focused HI agency. We are experimenting with productivity tools, cognitive tools, knowledge maps, and neuroplasticity to augment individuals and teams to perform at superhuman levels.  We are a vertically integrated operation performing end-to-end recruiting, applicant tracking, training, individual/team knowledge management, and individual/team placement. We are introducing a new market innovation, training candidates from non-tech industries who are making a shift to tech work as the economy evolves, as well as new grads with no industry experience. We pair trainees on the less experienced end of the spectrum with our best engineers, placing inexperienced candidates on high-performing teams to build good habits from the start. Learning on the job is the fastest way to get new candidates from 0 to productive. We focus on placing entire proven teams (Employable Units) in scaling startups that have recently reached product-market fit and need to scale out with high-functioning engineering teams.

Description: The only customer support platform created to help B2B companies support customer teams
Full Description: Fogbender helps B2B companies support customer teams: think Intercom meets Slack's shared channels. Today, all customer software is explicitly or implicitly designed for helping individuals, not teams. This is forcing B2B companies - who sell products to teams, not individuals - to augment their default customer support platform (Zendesk, Intercom, Front, etc) with a second, "unofficial", system: Slack's shared channels. This causes a number of operational and logistical difficulties for both vendors and their customers, resulting in added costs, inefficiencies, and lost opportunities. With Fogbender, B2B vendors embed a team-to-team messaging widget directly on their customer dashboard, where all users belonging to an account can - with no additional authentication - 1) see a list of currently-open issues 2) participate in conversations with their own team and the vendor, and 3) search all historical discussions.

Description: Remote assessment software for conducting tests and exams online
Full Description: Test Invite is an online assessment software for organizations that would like to conduct online assessments in a proctored & secure online exam platform. The platform provides an easy-to-use exam builder for recruiters & trainers to create a wide range of online tests from simple to complex. Besides, the platform provides ready-to-use pre-employment tests to HR professionals for skill assessments. With Test Invite, a test operator can create a comprehensive question bank and integrate the extensive question pool for creating various exam processes. Sections, pages, questions, and choices from the question bank can be shuffled for each exam for all test takers by the operator. Besides, a test operator can build a ready-to-use exam environment with multiple time limits and going forward-backward settings to each stage of the exam for test-takers. For providing security for online exams, the test operator can record videos and take photographs from all test-takers webcams during the exam with Test Invite. Besides, test takers' monitors can be locked up in a fullscreen mode. The test operator can record and monitor test-takers screens on devices during the exam process. For assessment of the online exam results, Test Invite provides a highly advanced reporting system. You can categorize questions of the test and compare the exam scores of each test-takers. The advanced reporting eases the evaluation of weaknesses and strengths of each test-takers. Test Invite is an online exam software is built for organizations of any size. The "pay as you go" plan and credit system enable companies to use the system when they have just needed online exam processes without any recurring payment plans.

Fundamental changes in global consumption patterns, value-driven purchasing behavior, the rebalancing of supply chains, the rise of online learning and entertainment, and a renewed focus on personal care and wellbeing underpin our high-conviction investment strategies. Principally speaking, our Garden District Ventures team is committed to backing those mission-driven startups that are disrupting the status quo, delighting their customers, and solving real-world problems.

At Falaya, our mission is to upend the real estate industry by putting more power in the hands of the actual buyers and sellers in the market. We do this through the use of revolutionary technology and overwhelming support.  When we started Falaya, we completely scrapped the traditional real estate pricing structure and went back to the drawing board. With three distinct pricing options and a host of on-demand services, Falaya sellers have more choice in both the cost of selling their property and the level of involvement that real estate agents play in that process.  Falaya sellers have access to a variety of game-changing features including - document automation, marketing automation, showings management, push-button offers, virtual tours, and on-demand Realtor support. All of our features are specifically designed to maximize efficiency and create more transparency in the real estate process. We pride ourselves on providing sellers with overwhelming service through each step of the process with transaction coordinators monitoring things in the background and on-demand support when and where the seller needs it.

Full Description: Pria is a B2B SaaS company with a go-to-market focus on major health systems/hospitals that deliver care to patients who are explicitly enrolled in Medicare.. Pria is the Operating System for Health at Home. We integrate health-at-home solutions for chronic care management, and allow healthcare organizations to deliver them at scale to their patients and members. At Pria, we are building a new health ecosystem where "home is the new hospital" and the experience is designed to affordably/effectively deliver care to the growing Medicare population of 65M patients as of 2022. Pria is an all-in-one, health-at-home platform that acts as a proactive digital nurse and consists of both a hardware and software component She guide patients on a 24x7 basis through their entire health and wellness journey to ensure adherence to prescribed care plans and lifestyle activities. Pria brings all the best-in-class pathways for specific conditions and lifestyle services to help patients age in place. With the caregiver app and remote care team portal, real-time alerts and reports are communicated to the patient’s family and clinical care team for continual second-to-none monitoring.
Headquarters Regions: Washington DC Metro Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Health Care, Mobile

Description: SaaS Mag is the world's definitive quarterly SaaS publication for those working or interested in the industry.
Full Description: SaaS Mag was born from SaaS M&A advisors who have had the privilege to encounter no shortage of brilliant SaaS founders, executives and investors. Recognizing that the SaaS industry has expanded exponentially over the last decade—and it’s no wonder given the influence of technology on businesses—these advisors saw a need for a community to support enthusiasts of the dynamic SaaS industry. Enter, SaaS Mag. Businesses are nearing a critical point at which operating without SaaS will become impossible, if it isn’t already. Over the last five years in particular, the SaaS businesses being valued and sold have become more complex, sophisticated, and most importantly, aware of their customers’ needs. At SaaS Mag, we are incredibly excited for the future of the SaaS industry, and increasingly so as the dialogues contained in this magazine grow ever insightful. There is no question that SaaS is integral to the success of both the B2B and B2C markets—now it is a matter of waiting to see where the industry is driven by its brilliant founders, investors, operators and enthusiasts. With our finger on the pulse, our experts are right alongside every major development, story, accomplishment, disappointment and breakthrough made in the SaaS industry.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Internet Services, Lending and Investments, Software

Description: Keibi is an enablement platform that helps organization of all sizes to do better on the cloud through data science.
Full Description: Keibi is a SaaS platform that helps you manage, assess and secure your cloud to give you the power and flexibility to do whatever needs doing — whether you’re a startup, scale-up, or global enterprise. We gather data from multiple sources to develop insights, determine trends, and flag risky configurations across your enterprise utilizing the latest data science techniques and algorithms.   Unlike purpose built security tools, our platform engages Product, Engineering, Operations and Security teams to do better without agents or configuration changes.   This means engineering teams build more secure products from the start, Operational and DevOps teams can get ahead of issues before they become outages, security teams can catch problems before they become security incidents, and product teams can prioritize backlogs better.    We enable all teams to do better on the cloud. We call this cloud enablement.
